# Setup

## Load data













::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
source(here::here("scripts", "00_libraries.R"))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dat_10ms <- dir_ls(path = here("data", "by_id_10ms"), regexp = "\\.csv$") %>%
  as_tibble() %>% 
  pull() %>% 
  map_dfr(read_csv, id = "source") %>% 
  separate(source, into = c("path", "id", "trash"), 
    sep = c(nchar(here("data", "by_id_10ms")) + 1, 
            nchar(here("data", "by_id_10ms")) + 6)) %>% 
  select(-path, -trash)

dat_50ms <- dir_ls(path = here("data", "by_id_50ms"), regexp = "\\.csv$") %>%
  as_tibble() %>% 
  pull() %>% 
  map_dfr(read_csv, id = "source") %>% 
  separate(source, into = c("path", "id", "trash"), 
    sep = c(nchar(here("data", "by_id_10ms")) + 1, 
            nchar(here("data", "by_id_10ms")) + 6)) %>% 
  select(-path, -trash)
```
:::

## Plot settings

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(out.width = "100%")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
theme_set(theme_bw())
theme_update(
  axis.title.y = element_text(size = rel(.9), hjust = 0.95),
  axis.title.x = element_text(size = rel(.9), hjust = 0.95),
  panel.grid.major = element_line(colour = 'grey90', size = 0.15),
  panel.grid.minor = element_line(colour = 'grey90', size = 0.15)
)
```
:::

# Eye-tracking data

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dat_10ms %>% 
  filter(time_zero >= -100, time_zero <= 100) %>% 
  ggplot(., aes(x = time_zero, y = target_prop)) + 
    geom_hline(yintercept = 0.5, lty = 3) + 
    geom_vline(xintercept = 0, lty = 3) + 
    stat_summary(fun.data = mean_se, geom = "ribbon", alpha = 0.5) + 
    stat_summary(fun = mean, geom = "line") + 
    coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 1)) + 
    labs(title = "Proportion of target fixations (all data)", 
      subtitle = "Time course relative to target syllable onset", 
      x = "Time from target syllable onset", y = "p(correct)")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04_exploratory_plots_files/figure-html/exp-time-course-1.png){width=100%}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dat_10ms %>% 
  filter(time_zero >= -100, time_zero <= 100) %>% 
  ggplot(., aes(x = time_zero, y = target_prop)) + 
    geom_hline(yintercept = 0.5, lty = 3) + 
    geom_vline(xintercept = 0, lty = 3) + 
    stat_summary(fun.data = mean_se, geom = "ribbon", alpha = 0.5, 
      aes(fill = group)) + 
    stat_summary(fun = mean, geom = "line", aes(color = group)) + 
    scale_fill_viridis_d(name = NULL, begin = 0.3, end = 0.7, option = "D") + 
    scale_color_viridis_d(name = NULL, begin = 0.3, end = 0.7, option = "D") +
    coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 1)) + 
    labs(title = "Proportion of target fixations by group", 
      subtitle = "Time course relative to target syllable onset", 
      x = "Time from target syllable onset", y = "p(correct)")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04_exploratory_plots_files/figure-html/exp-time-course-group-1.png){width=100%}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dat_10ms %>% 
  filter(time_zero >= -100, time_zero <= 100) %>% 
  ggplot(., aes(x = time_zero, y = target_prop)) + 
    geom_hline(yintercept = 0.5, lty = 3) + 
    geom_vline(xintercept = 0, lty = 3) + 
    stat_summary(fun.data = mean_se, geom = "ribbon", alpha = 0.3, 
      aes(fill = noun_transparency)) + 
    stat_summary(fun = mean, geom = "line", aes(color = noun_transparency)) + 
    scale_fill_viridis_d(name = NULL, begin = 0.3, end = 0.7, option = "D") + 
    scale_color_viridis_d(name = NULL, begin = 0.3, end = 0.7, option = "D") +
    coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 1)) + 
    labs(title = "Target fixations as a function of noun transparency", 
      subtitle = "Time course relative to target syllable onset", 
      x = "Time from target syllable onset", y = "p(correct)")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04_exploratory_plots_files/figure-html/exp-time-course-transparency-1.png){width=100%}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dat_10ms %>% 
  filter(time_zero >= -100, time_zero <= 100) %>% 
  ggplot(., aes(x = time_zero, y = target_prop)) + 
    facet_grid(. ~ group) + 
    geom_hline(yintercept = 0.5, lty = 3) + 
    geom_vline(xintercept = 0, lty = 3) + 
    stat_summary(fun.data = mean_se, geom = "ribbon", alpha = 0.3, 
      aes(fill = noun_transparency)) + 
    stat_summary(fun = mean, geom = "line", aes(color = noun_transparency)) + 
    scale_fill_viridis_d(name = NULL, begin = 0.3, end = 0.7, option = "D") + 
    scale_color_viridis_d(name = NULL, begin = 0.3, end = 0.7, option = "D") +
    coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 1)) + 
    labs(x = "Time from target syllable onset", y = "p(correct)", 
      title = "Target fixations: noun transparency by group", 
      subtitle = "Time course relative to target syllable onset")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04_exploratory_plots_files/figure-html/exp-time-course-transparency-group-1.png){width=100%}
:::
:::


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dat_10ms %>% 
  filter(time_zero >= -100, time_zero <= 100) %>% 
  ggplot(., aes(x = time_zero, y = target_prop)) + 
    facet_grid(gender ~ group) + 
    geom_hline(yintercept = 0.5, lty = 3) + 
    geom_vline(xintercept = 0, lty = 3) + 
    stat_summary(fun.data = mean_se, geom = "ribbon", alpha = 0.3, 
      aes(fill = noun_transparency)) + 
    stat_summary(fun = mean, geom = "line", aes(color = noun_transparency)) + 
    scale_fill_viridis_d(name = NULL, begin = 0.3, end = 0.7, option = "D") + 
    scale_color_viridis_d(name = NULL, begin = 0.3, end = 0.7, option = "D") +
    coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 1)) + 
    labs(x = "Time from target syllable onset", y = "p(correct)", 
      title = "Target fixations: noun transparency and gender by group", 
      subtitle = "Time course relative to target syllable onset")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04_exploratory_plots_files/figure-html/exp-time-course-transparency-gender-group-1.png){width=100%}
:::
:::
